turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Good afternoon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't know. I'm just looking for something to eat today. Do you have any suggestions?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HOw about pizza from Bella Luna's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. That sounds good, pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you know of any place besides Ballerina's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: None of them are as good as Bella Luna's.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh well, I guess I'll go with that, then. What do they offer there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get some steak from there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They have a wide variety of pizza toppings including seafood and prime rib.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ooh, seafood prime rib. Can Can you name off the toppings for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It'll take a moment okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that'd be okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Are you still there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, SO Bella Luna's Pizza toppings include: anchovies, spinach, bell peppers, jalepenos, pepperocinni, olives, 3 kinds of mushrooms, hardboiled egg, 3 kinds of cheeses seafood and more.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I think I think.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We're kind of hungry. I think we'll take four medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And we'd like two of them to be seafood pizzas. Now, what kind of seafood are we talking about?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Shrimp, fish, I mean Exactly, when you say seafood, what do you mean?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Shrimp, crab, lobster and optionally oyster.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yeah, okay, Lina. We'll take two We'll take two medium seafood pizzas, and then we'll have a meat lover's pizza, and then one I think I'll just have with pepperonis, sausage, extra cheese, and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 mediums, 2 seafood, 1 meatlovers, 1 pepperoni sausage, onions, and extra cheese right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, ma'am.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great that's going to be about 56 dollars okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's okay. It's kind of high, though. If I come pick him up, I can't get a discount?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I mean, they don't they don't they don't charge less for pick-up for pick-ups and they do deliveries.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: They don't have any coupons or specials going on?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well it's 18.99 per medium pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So it's just a straight price. They had no They have no They run no deal specials?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me check that right now for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, they have a seafood promotion deal right now. It's buy two seafood pizzas any size and get 2 pizzas free (of equal or lesser size).

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, that's what I want, then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, cuz we're getting two seafood pizzas and we should 3488, thank you. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that'll be 34 88 okay?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. It'll be ready in 30 minutes. Have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
